Capital One.EVENT NAME: Elimination of Overdraft and NSF Fees
Capital One.description: Capital One became the first major U.S. bank to completely eliminate overdraft and insufficient-fund fees, enhancing customer satisfaction and attracting new customers seeking more transparent banking.

Capital One announced a five-year plan committing $265 billion towards lending, philanthropy, and investments to support low-and-moderate-income communities, enhancing its appeal to socially conscious consumers.

Capital One.EVENT NAME: Proposed Acquisition of Discover Financial Services
Capital One.description: Capital One proposed a $35.3 billion acquisition of Discover Financial Services, aiming to expand its consumer base and become the largest U.S. credit card issuer.
An investigation into Capital One's proposed acquisition of Discover Financial Services may negatively impact consumer trust and retention.
The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau filed a lawsuit alleging deceptive practices that caused customers to lose $2 billion in interest, potentially leading to consumer distrust.
Capital One offered a $250 bonus for new 360 Checking accounts, requiring two direct deposits of $500 or more within 75 days, likely attracting new customers.
New 360 Performance Savings account holders could earn up to $1,500 by depositing specified amounts, incentivizing account openings.
Capital One completed its migration to a cloud-first infrastructure, providing enhanced digital banking experiences and attracting tech-savvy consumers.
Capital One implemented measures to assist customers affected by the COVID-19 pandemic, including financial relief options, retaining existing customers and attracting new ones.
Capital One introduced advanced fraud detection and prevention tools for e-commerce transactions, increasing trust among online shoppers.
Capital One reaffirmed its commitment to diversity, inclusion, and belonging, improving its reputation and attracting socially conscious consumers.

Capital One.EVENT NAME: Venture X Rewards Credit Card Launch
Capital One.description: Capital One launched the Venture X Rewards Credit Card with substantial welcome bonuses and travel perks, appealing to affluent consumers.
Capital One enhanced its fraud prevention measures for online transactions, attracting customers who value secure digital banking.

Capital One.EVENT NAME: Fortune 100 Best Companies to Work For
Capital One.description: Capital One ranked 15th on Fortune's 100 Best Companies to Work For, boosting its reputation and appealing to employees and consumers.
Capital One awarded over $3.5 million in grants to nonprofit organizations, appealing to socially conscious customers.
Capital One announced special meetings for stockholder votes on its Discover Financial Services merger, attracting attention from financial industry stakeholders.
Capital One released its annual report detailing financial performance and initiatives, improving transparency and trust among consumers.
Capital One adapted strategies to accommodate consumers facing financial strain from student loan repayments, retaining customers.
Capital One promoted eco-friendly practices and green energy investments, appealing to environmentally conscious consumers.
